data.title: Playing as "any" (random) should not favor side with more subfactions
data.body: I think the game should first decide a random side (allies, soviets) and then a random subfaction of that side. I asked @pchote who confirmed that currently the side with more factions will be favored (picked more often).

data.title: Using spy plane triggers "enemy approaching" warning
data.body:
Using spy plane on enemy base trigers the warning.

In general "enemy approaching" warning is triggered way too often IMO (for example: when you're attacking the enemy). Ideally it should only be triggered by defensive structures - as a warning (but @penev92 reports this is not possible under current implementation).

data.title: Better airdrop production

milestone.title: Future
milestone.description: This milestone is meant for stuff we want fixed, but don't have a timeline for yet. Also a collection of pull requests left undone.

data.body:
Due to GitHub being even more retarded than usual, I have to file a new PR instead of reopening #7468.
This is the same thing + the fixes.
The original C&C Nod Airstrip behavior is in place, as described in @pchote's last [comment](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7468#issuecomment-84653416).
Only thing left is to decide whether D2k carryalls should be delivered by the space frigate, or spawned on the map's edge when the frigate arrives, like the original game did.

Also doesn't contain the change regarding available subcells that was done in #7468.

data.title: Spy plane's target beacon not visible under shroud
data.body:
When spy plane is sent into unexplored terrain its target beacon isn't visible to the player.
Possibly also applies to beacons of other super powers.

data.title: Fixes #7764, #7780...
data.body:
...and other potential regressions introduced by #7671.

Supercedes #7782 and #7783.

data.title: Fixed undeploy animation for MCVs (and other transforming actors)
data.body: Closes #7780.

data.title: Fix race condition while evaluating traits on aircraft husks
data.body:
The crash happens when a landed aircraft is killed and is caused by the FallsToEarth trait not having been instantiated yet when the Plane constructor runs, causing the check in Plane::Tick() and Helicopter::Tick(), which is supposed to catch the 'Husk' case, to fail.

Due to a bug in the yaml loader (#6818) leading to inherited traits being instantiated last, the order of traits in the yaml rules cannot just be switched, which would have been the easiest solution.

Fixes #7764

data.title: UI is probably leaking somewhere
data.body:
Tick counter breaks when clicking on Skirmish (or 'Back' in Missions) in any mod, and I've just been able to reproduce this for a 2nd time:
![ohnoes1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2857877/6886157/00aaa432-d635-11e4-861a-6895402961cf.png)

data.title: MCVs are missing the undeploy animation
data.body:
> [17:43] < epicelite> MCV doesn't have de-deploy animation.
> [17:43] < epicelite> In Red Alert at least
> [17:44] < epicelite> it just pops goes from construction yard to MCV with no aimination

This seems to be a recent regression.

data.title: tech building that capitalises oil revenues?
data.body:
capture this building and it leverages oil income. so if you already got (say) one derrick making 1k per minute, this becomes (say) 10k available to you at all times.

but if you lose the derrick, all gone.

maybe call it "Bond Market"

could be fun way to hint at capitalist war finance in openra engine? :D

data.title: Remove bogus buildable actors from TS.
data.body:
This does an initial rough polish pass over the TS tech tree:
- Remove Buildable trait from special and civilian actors, which are otherwise buildable (even without cheats).
- Fix the mutant hijacker.
- Fix the EMP generator icon.

data.title: Remove OpenRA.TilesetBuilder.
data.body:
This has been unmaintained for years, and I suspect it may have been completely broken until 8844defb44fad9bd51ee644046c9abd9dd9f202a fixed a bunch of bitrot in tileset saving.  The CRLF issue with default.yaml (#7754) highlights that this is doing nothing for us except causing problems.

A general tileset building tool is a good idea in principle, but it would be better maintained as an outside project that outputs openra-compatible yaml without hooking into the engine internals.

data.title: Fixes D2k muzzle/firing offsets and cleans sequences
data.body: Note: The `Start: 0`/`Length: 1` removals are regression-proof since those are the internal defaults, so all you really need to test are actors with muzzle flash and the bazooka infantry.

data.title: Carryall is missing from the starport
data.body:
There is no `carryall.starport` actor defined anywhere any more, so you can't order a carryall from the starport.
Regression from < nobody_really_cares_what >.

data.title: Crash when nuke explodes.
data.body:
Got these on two occasions when we were playing red alert mod (playtest-20150328, the binaries from the deb on the github releases page) and a nuke exploded. The maps we were playing were different for both times and everyone who was playing crashed.

```
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Attempted to get trait from destroyed object (mig.husk 685 (not in world))
at OpenRA.TraitDictionary.CheckDestroyed (OpenRA.Actor actor) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.TraitDictionary.GetOrDefault[ITargetable] (OpenRA.Actor actor) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Actor.TraitOrDefault[ITargetable] () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Traits.Target.FromActor (OpenRA.Actor a) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Traits.Reservable.Tick (OpenRA.Actor self) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.World.<Tick>m__3 (TraitPair`1 x) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at (wrapper delegate-invoke) <Module>:invoke_void__this___TraitPair`1<ITick> (OpenRA.TraitPair`1<OpenRA.Traits.ITick>)
at OpenRA.WorldUtils.DoTimed[TraitPair`1] (IEnumerable`1 e, System.Action`1 a, System.String text) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.World.Tick () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Game.InnerLogicTick (OpenRA.Network.OrderManager orderManager) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Game.LogicTick () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Game.Loop () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
```

```
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Attempted to get trait from destroyed object (yak.husk 827 (not in world))
at OpenRA.TraitDictionary.CheckDestroyed (OpenRA.Actor actor) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
```
